value:
I got kidnapped by pirates and ended
up all the way in Valentia. Of all the
luck!

I'm done being a soldier. I'm running
a shop in Altea with Abel. It may be
tiny, but it's ours!

I just saw kid-me walking around! I
guess there are lots of different mes
here, from different worlds... Wild!

There are so many good people here.
Come to think of it, maybe there's
somebody for my sister Palla!

Even after I left the Macedonian
Whitewings, I would sometimes
drill with the knights of Altea.

Your friend $Nf
sent me. Bye now!

My instinct for combat is coming
back. I'm sure I can help!

I am NOT getting kidnapped by
pirates, or ANYBODY, EVER again!
I really do have the worst luck.

This is for me? Thank you! That
cheers me up.

It's good to meet you! I'm Est. I may
not be a soldier anymore, but I still
know my way around a battlefield.

*sigh* Here I am, fighting again. I'd
finally quit being a soldier and set up
shop with Abel too.$k$pAnd if I hadn't gotten kidnapped by
pirates in the first place, my sisters
wouldn't have gotten roped into this.$k$pThere's no use fretting about it.
I just have to try and give my help
to whoever needs it!$k$pI may have quit the Whitewings, but
I'm still a pegasus knight. I have my
pride!$k$pOnce we bring peace to Askr and
Valentia, I can go back to the shop.$k$pWait for me, Abel! I'll be back as soon
as the fighting is over!
Comin' through!
It's the end for you!
Look at this, Abel!
Oh, I'm ready!
No... Abel...
My name's Est. I'm the youngest of three. Do you know Palla and Catria?
Ah! Oh, come on! And they say I'm childish! Tch...
I'm done with being a soldier. I'm running a shop with Abel.
I'd finally settled down, and then I got kidnapped by pirates. Just my luck!
Well, I've come this far. I'm going to give this fight my all. Are you with me?
Oh, Abel... When will we finally live in peace together?
I've been through a lot, but I'm glad to have met you.
Order's ready!
What? Really?
Off I go!
